author: tim
msg: Modified build system to make it easier to control
whether the paranoid block is excluded, whether
the docs are prepared, and whether validation is
performed on the config, xdocs, and jars.
Also modified the validate.* parameters to work

author: stefano
msg: - smaller notices in case blocks are exluded
- pretty printed WARNING in case of alpha blocks
- removed the "alpha" term that gave bad impression to people

- added "unless.excluded..." to "block-***-prepare" so that the block is not prepared if exluded from the build (this speeds up the build rather significantly when only a few blocks are selected... as I normally do ;-)

author: stefano
msg: - removed JVM-specific warning since we don't have any JVM-specific code anymore
- prettier format and make compiling options stand out better

author: reinhard
msg: - javac (1.3.1) needs the "this" prefix in order to compile
